publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2363 Robin Harper: CHILDREN 1st and Health Visitor Provision—That the Parliament congratulates CHILDREN 1st on its latest briefing document, Policy priorities for improving the wellbeing of Scotland’s most vulnerable children and their families; draws the attention of the Scottish Government to the issues raised, and, in particular, urges the Minister for Children and Early Years and the Cabinet Secretary for Health and Wellbeing to work together to strengthen and expand universal health visitor provision for all families in Scotland.
S3M-2363 CHILDREN 1st and Health Visitor Provision (lodged on 1 August 2008) Angela Constance*, Elaine Smith*, Gil Paterson*, Patrick Harvie*
S3M-2363 CHILDREN 1st and Health Visitor Provision (lodged on 1 August 2008) Jack McConnell*, Mike Pringle*, Sandra White*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2363 CHILDREN 1st and Health Visitor Provision (lodged on 1 August 2008) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-2363 CHILDREN 1st and Health Visitor Provision (lodged on 1 August 2008) Keith Brown*
